title: DODO'S 7KOLLAGES
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:rso]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:redtape
|years=77
]]


[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dodos-7kollages/PurpleDodo1.jpg
|caption=PURPLETAPE
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --logo-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme%3Aredtape/midnightwhite.png");
    --header-title: "FAVOURS";
    --header-subtitle: "OF FORTUNA";

/* Standard Colors */
    --white-monochrome: 252, 252, 252;
    /* white */
    --pale-gray-monochrome: 244, 244, 244;
    /* v light gray for blockquotes and stuff */
    --light-gray-monochrome: 170, 170, 170;
    /* light accent gray for login status */
    --gray-monochrome: 66, 66, 72;
    /* gray */
    --dark-gray-monochrome: 48, 48, 52;
    /* dark accent gray for sidebar background */
    --black-monochrome: 12, 12, 12;
    /* black */
    --pale-accent: 102, 87, 175;
    --bright-accent: 102, 87, 175;
    /* bright blue */
    --medium-accent: 48, 41, 122;
    /* pale blue */
    --dark-accent: 0, 0, 72;
    /* v pale blue */
    --newpage-color: 164, 194, 236;
}

#header::before {
    height: calc(100% - var(--topbar-height-on-desktop));
    aspect-ratio: 1;
    left: 50%;
    top: 0.3rem;
    background-image: url(http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/occult/Scales.png);
    background-size: contain;
    transform: translatex(-50%);
    filter: invert(1);
}

#header::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    background: white;
    opacity: 0.01;
    height: 25.5%;
    width: 0.5rem;
    bottom: 53%;
    left: calc(50% - 0.25rem);
    transform-origin: bottom center;
    transform: rotate(calc(360deg - 30deg * var(--minutes-to-midnight)/60));
}

#extra-div-3 {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 10rem;
    background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dodos-7kollages/purpletapes.png");
    background-size: 130%;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: repeat-x;
    pointer-events: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[=]]

[[module Rate]]

++++++ Holy hell, are we doing these yearly now?
-----
As **[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dodos-arts-and-crafts-corner before,]** the SCP wiki's X000 contest has turned out an incredible array of works. These collages are inspired by a handful of the ones whose imagery stuck with me. I'll try to do a few batches this year, so stay tuned! As always, feel free to leave a comment with some recommendations below... 

You never know when you may get lucky...
@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab Batch 1]]

-----

@@ @@
++ [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7077 Where Sky Meets Sea]

//This place, it's not showing one event, a single night, an argument. There's a strata to it. Does that mean there's an intent? Or does it just fall into place, layer by layer?//

Authors: [[*user DodoDevil]] and [[*user Elenee FishTruck]]

[[=image SkySea-m.jpg]]

++ [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7000 The Loser]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[collapsible show=" 🎶 "I don't wanna be funny anymore" 🎶 " hide=" "I don't wanna be funny anymore" "]]
**[*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpXyMNMMzRY I don't wanna be funny anymore]**
Lately I've been feeling like the odd man out
I hurt my friends saying things I don't mean out loud
I don't wanna be funny anymore
[...]
I don't want the joke to be on me
Yeah, I'll buy the clothes and I'll be the best dressed
Yeah, I'll read the books and I'll be the smartest
I'll play guitar and I'll be the artist
Try not to laugh
I know it'll be hard
I'm serious
I know it's a first but
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]

Author: [[*user HarryBlank]]

[[=image Fool-m.jpg]]
